1167000.name: Steel Division 2 - Reinforcement Pack #11 - Army General Coop
1167000.description:
Go to battle with your friends in the new and much-requested Steel Division 2 Army General Coop mode, available for free in this Reinforcement Pack.

Online cooperative play in Steel Division 2s sweeping strategic turn-based mode is now a reality, with Army General Coop allowing you to play a campaign alongside up to four friends versus the AI.

Select a campaign, organize the troops and proceed to fight together. Each individual Army General campaign, including those featured in Steel Division 2’s, Death on the Vistula, Fate of Finland, Black Sunday, and Burning Baltics, can now be played in Army General Coop mode.

Army General Coop mode comes as part of a Reinforcement Pack, available for free to all owners of Steel Division 2.
1167000.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
